On October&#160;25, 2016 , Apple&#160;Inc. (&#8220;Apple&#8221;) issued a press release regarding Apple&#8217;s financial results for its fourth fiscal quarter ended September&#160;24, 2016 &#32;and a related data sheet. A copy of Apple&#8217;s press release is attached hereto as Exhibit&#160;99.1 and a copy of the related data sheet is attached hereto as Exhibit&#160;99.2. The information contained in this Current Report shall not be deemed &#8220;filed&#8221; for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing. &#160; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &#160; (d) Exhibits.
